text:
Publicis Media | Senior Software Engineer | NYC | Full time | ONSITE | $140-180k

We are a growing adtech agency in Lower Manhattan. Looking for a senior generalist. We have had great success hiring Junior Engineers and need someone with experience and technical leadership to guide them. Specific technology experience does not matter, but for reference our stack is Ruby and TypeScript. Please email sandy.vanderbleek@publicismedia.com to apply directly. Thanks!
